verbs.description: The U.S. and China [V: have] been in a stand - off that threatened to escalate in a full - blown trade war since Trump announced $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports .
[ARG1: The U.S. and China] have [V: been] [ARG2: in a stand - off that threatened to escalate in a full - blown trade war since Trump announced $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports] .
The U.S. and China have been in [ARG0: a stand - off] [R-ARG0: that] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to escalate in a full - blown trade war since Trump announced $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports] .

The U.S. and China have been in a stand - off [ARG1: that] threatened to [V: escalate] [ARG2: in a full - blown trade war] [ARGM-TMP: since Trump announced $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports] .
The U.S. and China have been in a stand - off that threatened to escalate in a [ARGM-EXT: full] - [V: blown] [ARG1: trade war] since Trump announced $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports .
The U.S. and China have been in a stand - off that threatened to escalate in a full - blown trade war since [ARG0: Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: $ 50 billion of tariffs on Chinese imports] .
